concept.title: Field Level Encryption from the Java SDK
concept.shortdesc: Field Level Encryption is available in Couchbase Data Platform 5.5, from Java SDK version 2.6.0.

section.title: Test Sample
section.p: Here is a section of our test code that serves as a useful example for working with the Field Level Encryption API in Java. It verifies AES-128 and RSA, using the Java Key Store (JCEKS), demonstrating the use of several parameters to JsonObject .
